attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a health or social worker has to visit a child they must physically see the child before they can write a report on the child.Any child not at the address should be seen in 24 hours wherever they are alleged to be.There must be Zero tolerance on this procedure to ensure parental excuses eg.that the child is asleep elsewhere or on holiday will not allow abuse to go undetected.
